questions.question: For a circuit with K lines _____________ single stuck at fault is possible.

explanations.b: Each of the K lines can be stuck at logic 0 or logic 1, resulting in 2K possible single stuck-at faults.

questions.question: In a decoder if input lines are 4 then the no of maximum output lines will be _____________ .

explanations.a: A decoder with 4 input lines can produce a maximum of 2⁴ = 16 distinct output lines.

explanations.c: A decoder uses inverters to generate complemented inputs and AND gates to combine input combinations for generating unique outputs.

questions.question: Stuck at fault modeling comes under _____________ level fault model.

explanations.d: Stuck-at fault modeling assumes faults at specific lines or nodes in the circuit’s structure, making it a structural-level fault model.

questions.question: Fault test cases can be minimized by which of the following ?

explanations.c: Fault equivalence groups faults that produce the same erroneous behavior, allowing test cases to be minimized by testing only one representative from each group.
